author: Ruben Hassid
author_headline: Master AI before it masters you.
text:
How to turn your Linkedin into a landing page:

(in less than 5 minutes, with this AI)

1) Go to your LinkedIn profile.
2) Click “More” and “Save to PDF”.
3) Go to Gamma(.)app, select "Create new".
4) Upload your profile and select "Webpage".
5) Select one of the pre-set Gamma themes.
6) Preview and publish your landing page.

Within 5 minutes, you have a landing page using AI and your LinkedIn profile with a URL to share.

By the way, Gamma's growth is absolutely wild:

☑ They raised over 19 million dollars.
☑ They have over 50 million users.
☑ It's the 15th most used AI app. 

And people still think AI = ChatGPT.
